name: HeadON!
description: HeadON! is a fast paced Virtual Reality header game. Don't break your neck and head on!
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 10 Processor: Intel or AMD Quadcore Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 10 Series or Radeon RX 400 Series DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: VR Headset required
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 10 Processor: i7-6700K or Ryzen 5 1600X Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GeForece GTX 1080 or Radeon RX 500 Series DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: VR Headset required
